AIRTABLE.name: Airtable
AIRTABLE.tagline: Democratizing software creation by enabling anyone to build the tools that meet their needs
AIRTABLE.overview: Provider of an AI-native low-code platform that combines database functionality with spreadsheet simplicity for building custom applications. The company focuses on democratizing software creation by enabling anyone to build tools that meet their specific workflow needs without coding expertise. It helps organizations automate processes, manage data, and create custom apps through an intuitive visual interface and AI assistance. The company provides the Airtable Platform, AI Cobuilder, Omni AI Assistant, Interface Designer, and automation workflows. It promotes accessible software development through natural language app creation and intelligent automation capabilities.

products.name: Airtable Platform
products.description: Core AI-native low-code platform combining powerful database functionality with intuitive spreadsheet interface, enabling teams to build custom applications, manage complex data relationships, and automate workflows without requiring traditional software development expertise.

products.name: Airtable Cobuilder
products.description: Revolutionary AI-powered application builder enabling users to create fully functional custom apps in seconds using natural language prompts, automatically generating tables, fields, views, and automations based on simple conversational descriptions.

products.name: Omni AI Assistant
products.description: Integrated artificial intelligence assistant available across all pricing tiers that helps users analyze data, write formulas, summarize information, and automate repetitive tasks through conversational interactions within the platform.

products.name: Interface Designer
products.description: Visual interface building tool enabling users to create beautiful, branded applications with custom layouts, forms, and dashboards that display Airtable data without any coding knowledge required for deployment.

products.name: Automations
products.description: Powerful workflow automation engine enabling trigger-based actions that connect Airtable with external services, send notifications, update records, and execute complex business logic automatically based on defined conditions.

ALGOLIA.name: Algolia
ALGOLIA.tagline: Transforming how the world discovers information—enabling people to find what they need effortlessly
ALGOLIA.overview: Provider of AI-powered search and discovery APIs enabling developers to build fast, relevant search experiences for websites and applications. The company focuses on API-first architecture combining keyword matching, neural vector search, business rules, and personalization to deliver instant results. It helps enterprises improve product discovery, content findability, and user engagement through customizable search solutions. The company provides AI search engines, recommendation systems, front-end UI components, and agentic retrieval tools for AI workflows. It promotes developer-friendly search infrastructure that transforms how organizations surface information to their users.

products.name: Algolia AI Search
products.description: Enterprise search platform combining neural vector search with keyword matching, faceted filtering, and typo tolerance to deliver sub-50ms search results across billions of records with built-in analytics and A/B testing capabilities.

products.name: Agent Studio
products.description: Unified retrieval engine platform enabling AI agents and LLM applications to access enterprise data through a centralized search infrastructure with semantic understanding and context-aware responses.

products.name: Algolia Recommend
products.description: AI-powered product recommendations engine using collaborative filtering and machine learning to surface personalized suggestions for e-commerce, media, and content platforms based on user behavior patterns.

products.name: InstantSearch
products.description: Open-source frontend UI component library for React, Vue, Angular, and vanilla JavaScript enabling developers to rapidly build search interfaces with pre-built widgets for filters, pagination, and result highlighting.

ALCHEMY.name: Alchemy
ALCHEMY.tagline: Powering the future of Web3 by making blockchain development accessible to everyone
ALCHEMY.overview: Provider of Web3 developer infrastructure and blockchain APIs enabling companies to build decentralized applications without managing their own nodes. The company focuses on enterprise-grade blockchain connectivity with high availability, fast response times, and comprehensive developer tooling. It helps businesses deploy blockchain applications, smart contracts, and Web3 services through simplified APIs and SDKs. The company provides node infrastructure, smart wallet solutions, NFT APIs, rollup deployment tools, and developer grants programs. It promotes blockchain adoption by abstracting away infrastructure complexity and enabling developers to focus on building applications.

products.name: Alchemy Supernode
products.description: Enterprise-grade multi-chain node infrastructure providing reliable blockchain connectivity for Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Solana with guaranteed uptime SLAs and automatic scaling for high-traffic applications.

products.name: Cortex Engine
products.description: Intelligent blockchain query engine delivering sub-50ms response times through optimized data indexing and caching, enabling real-time blockchain data access with significantly reduced latency for decentralized applications.

products.name: Account Kit
products.description: Smart wallet infrastructure enabling applications to embed crypto wallets with social login, gas sponsorship, and account abstraction features that simplify user onboarding without requiring browser extensions.

products.name: NFT API
products.description: Comprehensive NFT data platform providing metadata, ownership history, marketplace pricing, and collection analytics across multiple blockchains through a unified REST and WebSocket API interface.

ABB-E-MOBILITY.name: ABB E-mobility
ABB-E-MOBILITY.tagline: Making reliable EV charging a reality for drivers, fleets, and cities worldwide
ABB-E-MOBILITY.overview: Provider of global electric vehicle charging infrastructure solutions for homes, businesses, and public spaces. The company focuses on delivering comprehensive charging technology across the full power spectrum from residential wallboxes to megawatt-class commercial systems. It helps automakers, fleet operators, charging network providers, and municipalities deploy reliable EV infrastructure at scale. The company provides Terra AC wallboxes, Terra DC fast chargers, A-series ultra-fast chargers, and MCS megawatt charging systems. It promotes clean transportation adoption through design-awarded hardware and software-enabled charging network management.

products.description: Revolutionary 1.2 megawatt charging system designed specifically for heavy-duty electric trucks and commercial vehicles, enabling long-haul transport electrification with ultra-fast charging during driver rest breaks at highway locations.

products.description: Award-winning 400kW ultra-fast DC charger featuring compact design, liquid-cooled cables, and advanced power electronics delivering reliable public charging with industry-leading uptime for passenger vehicles and light commercial fleets.

products.name: A200/A300 Modular Chargers
products.description: Flexible modular DC fast chargers delivering 200-300kW with configurable power outputs, supporting both CCS and CHAdeMO standards for diverse public charging networks, retail locations, and fleet depot applications.

products.name: ChargeDock Fleet Solutions
products.description: Comprehensive depot charging solution for commercial fleets including buses, delivery vans, and trucks, featuring intelligent load management, maintenance scheduling, and fleet management software integration.

products.name: Terra AC Wallbox
products.description: Residential and workplace AC charging solutions delivering up to 22kW with smart connectivity features, dynamic load balancing, and seamless integration with home energy management systems and solar installations.

ABL-SPACE-SYSTEMS.name: Long Wall (f.k.a. ABL Space Systems)
ABL-SPACE-SYSTEMS.tagline: Democratizing access to space through rapid, low-cost launch capabilities
ABL-SPACE-SYSTEMS.overview: Developer of advanced aerospace systems pivoting from commercial space launch to missile defense technology platforms. The company focuses on rapidly deployable launch vehicles, missile defense test systems, and hypersonic flight test vehicles for national security applications. It helps the Pentagon and defense contractors conduct missile defense testing, threat simulation exercises, and hypersonic vehicle development programs. The company provides RSX suborbital rockets, Ironwood mobile ground systems, and mass-producible defensive launch platforms. It promotes accessible defense infrastructure through simplified manufacturing and mobile deployment capabilities.

products.name: RSX Suborbital Rocket
products.description: Advanced suborbital launch vehicle designed for missile defense testing and threat simulation exercises, enabling rapid and affordable test flights for Pentagon programs evaluating defensive systems against ballistic threats.

products.name: Ironwood Ground System
products.description: Mobile, rapidly deployable ground support infrastructure featuring integrated command and control capabilities, propellant handling, and launch operations support that can be transported and erected in minimal time.

products.name: Hypersonic Test Vehicles
products.description: Mass-producible hypersonic flight test platforms supporting defense contractor and military research programs developing next-generation propulsion, guidance, and thermal protection systems at hypersonic speeds.

products.name: RS1 Launch Vehicle (Legacy)
products.description: Original commercial launch vehicle designed to deliver 1,350 kilograms to low Earth orbit using containerized transport system for rapid deployment from austere locations without traditional launch infrastructure.

ABLY-CORPORATION.name: Ably Corporation
ABLY-CORPORATION.tagline: Korea's leading AI-powered fashion commerce platform for personalized style discovery
ABLY-CORPORATION.overview: Developer of AI-powered fashion commerce platforms that transform personalized style discovery across Asia. ABNORMAL-AI.name: Abnormal Security
ABNORMAL-AI.tagline: AI-native cloud email security platform protecting enterprises from phishing and social engineering
ABNORMAL-AI.overview: Developer of AI-native cloud email security platforms that protect enterprises from sophisticated cyber threats using behavioral analysis. The company focuses on machine learning algorithms that understand human behavior patterns to detect and prevent phishing, social engineering, and account takeover attacks. It helps Fortune 500 companies and large enterprises safeguard their email communications and prevent financial fraud. The company provides Inbound Email Security, Account Takeover Protection, Email Security Posture Management, and AI Security Mailbox solutions. It promotes a proactive approach to cybersecurity through behavioral AI rather than traditional rule-based detection methods.

products.name: Inbound Email Security
products.description: Comprehensive AI-powered email protection platform analyzing thousands of behavioral signals to detect and block sophisticated phishing attacks, business email compromise, vendor fraud, and social engineering attempts that evade traditional secure email gateways.

products.name: Account Takeover Protection
products.description: Behavioral AI solution continuously monitoring user activity patterns and authentication events to detect compromised email accounts, identifying lateral movement, unusual access patterns, and malicious insider activity before data exfiltration occurs.

products.name: Email Security Posture Management
products.description: Comprehensive visibility and control platform providing security teams with insights into email configuration vulnerabilities, permission gaps, third-party app risks, and compliance posture across Microsoft 365 and Google Workspace environments.

products.name: AI Security Mailbox
products.description: Automated security operations center solution using natural language processing to triage employee-reported suspicious emails, investigate threats at machine speed, and provide instant remediation reducing SOC workload by up to 90 percent.

ABRIDGE.name: Abridge
ABRIDGE.tagline: AI-powered medical documentation platform reducing physician burnout and improving patient care
ABRIDGE.overview: Developer of AI-powered medical documentation platforms that reduce physician burnout while improving patient care quality. The company focuses on generative AI technology that transcribes and summarizes clinical conversations in real-time, automatically generating structured clinical notes. It helps physicians, health systems, and hospitals eliminate hours of manual documentation work while maintaining accuracy and compliance. The company provides ambient clinical documentation, patient summaries, EHR integration, and enterprise deployment solutions. It promotes physician wellness and healthcare efficiency through AI-assisted documentation that allows clinicians to focus on patient interactions.

products.name: Abridge Clinical Platform
products.description: Comprehensive ambient clinical documentation platform using generative AI to automatically transcribe patient-physician conversations, generate structured clinical notes, and reduce documentation time by up to 75% while maintaining medical accuracy and regulatory compliance.

products.name: Patient Summaries
products.description: AI-generated after-visit summaries providing patients with clear, plain-language explanations of their diagnoses, treatment plans, medications, and follow-up instructions to improve health literacy and care plan adherence.

products.name: EHR Integration Suite
products.description: Deep integration layer seamlessly connecting Abridge with Epic, Cerner, athenahealth, and major electronic health record systems, automatically pushing AI-generated notes into patient charts with proper coding and formatting.

products.name: Enterprise Deployment
products.description: Comprehensive health system rollout program including HIPAA-compliant infrastructure, training, change management, quality assurance workflows, and dedicated customer success support for organization-wide implementation.

ACKO.name: ACKO General Insurance

ACKO.overview: Developer of digital-first insurance platforms that transform how consumers purchase and manage coverage online. ACORNS.name: Acorns
ACORNS.tagline: Micro-investing platform helping everyday Americans save and invest their spare change
ACORNS.overview: Developer of micro-investing platforms that transform everyday purchases into investment opportunities through automated round-ups. The company focuses on making investing accessible to everyone by automatically investing spare change from linked debit and credit card transactions into diversified portfolios. It helps everyday Americans, families, and first-time investors build wealth gradually without requiring large upfront capital. The company provides Acorns Invest, Acorns Later retirement accounts, Acorns Early custodial accounts for children, and Acorns Checking with integrated banking. It promotes financial wellness and long-term wealth building through accessible, automated investment solutions.

products.description: Core micro-investing platform automatically rounding up everyday purchases to the nearest dollar and investing spare change into expert-built diversified ETF portfolios, making wealth building effortless for users without requiring investment knowledge or large capital.

products.description: Automated retirement savings solution offering Traditional, Roth, and SEP IRA accounts with personalized portfolio recommendations, automatic contributions, and intelligent tax optimization to help users build long-term retirement security.

products.name: Acorns Early
products.description: Custodial investment accounts (UTMA/UGMA) designed for parents to invest in their children's future with tax-advantaged growth, educational resources, and automated investing to build generational wealth from an early age.

products.name: Acorns Checking
products.description: Full-featured mobile banking account with heavy metal titanium debit card, no minimum balance requirements, no overdraft fees, and Smart Deposit for automatic paycheck splitting into spending, savings, and investment accounts.

AWARDCO.name: Awardco
AWARDCO.tagline: The leading employee recognition and rewards platform building culture through value-driven engagement
AWARDCO.overview: Developer of the leading employee recognition and rewards platform that boosts productivity, reduces program costs, and builds company culture through value-driven engagement. The company focuses on creating comprehensive recognition solutions with peer-to-peer rewards, manager programs, and service awards integrated with major e-commerce platforms. It helps enterprises worldwide to streamline employee rewards while offering access to extensive product catalogs without markup fees. The company provides recognition platforms, Amazon Business integration, and AI-powered external recognition features. It promotes employee engagement through accessible and customizable rewards programs.

AWAY.name: Away
AWAY.tagline: The original travel lifestyle brand making luggage and travel essentials for modern global travelers
AWAY.overview: Developer of premium travel lifestyle products known for innovative luggage design and a full range of travel essentials serving modern global travelers. The company focuses on creating thoughtfully designed hardshell and softside suitcases that combine durability, functionality, and aesthetic appeal. It helps travelers worldwide to organize their journeys with well-engineered luggage, bags, and accessories through direct-to-consumer and retail partnerships. The company provides hardside suitcases, softside luggage, travel bags, weekenders, and backpacks. It promotes seamless travel experiences through innovative product design and multi-channel retail strategy.

AXELAR-NETWORK.name: Axelar Network
AXELAR-NETWORK.tagline: The universal interoperability network connecting blockchains, applications and institutional finance
AXELAR-NETWORK.overview: Developer of the leading blockchain interoperability platform enabling seamless cross-chain communication across multiple blockchain ecosystems and institutional finance applications. The company focuses on providing infrastructure for financial institutions to tokenize real-world assets across diverse blockchain networks securely. It helps enterprises, developers, and decentralized applications to bridge assets and messages between EVM, Cosmos, and other chain architectures. The company provides cross-chain communication protocols, interchain token services, and development toolkits. It promotes universal blockchain interoperability for Web3 finance and institutional asset tokenization.

AXIOM-SPACE.name: Axiom Space
AXIOM-SPACE.tagline: Building the world's first commercial space station and pioneering human spaceflight infrastructure
AXIOM-SPACE.overview: Developer of the world's first commercial space station designed to succeed the International Space Station and provide continuous human presence in low Earth orbit. The company focuses on building modular orbital habitats and next-generation spacesuits while operating private astronaut missions to existing space infrastructure. It helps governments, researchers, and commercial customers to conduct space-based activities including manufacturing, research, tourism, and sovereign astronaut programs. The company provides commercial space station modules, advanced extravehicular activity suits, and crewed orbital missions. It promotes humanity's transition to commercial space infrastructure.

AXONIUS.name: Axonius
AXONIUS.tagline: The leader in cyber asset attack surface management helping organizations see, understand, and secure their digital infrastructure
AXONIUS.overview: Developer of cyber asset attack surface management platform that provides comprehensive visibility and control over organizational IT infrastructure and security posture. The company focuses on aggregating and correlating security data from enterprise IT and security tools to create unified asset inventories while exposing coverage gaps and vulnerabilities. It helps Fortune 500 companies and government agencies to identify unmanaged devices, enforce security policies, and maintain continuous compliance monitoring. The company provides asset intelligence platforms, exposure management solutions, SaaS security posture management, and healthcare-specific medical device security capabilities. It promotes proactive cybersecurity through complete infrastructure visibility.

products.name: Axonius Asset Cloud
products.description: Unified cyber asset management platform that aggregates data from over one thousand enterprise integrations to provide comprehensive asset inventory, SaaS security posture management, and exposure visibility with AI-powered automation and intelligent action capabilities across hybrid IT environments.

products.name: Axonius Exposures
products.description: Risk-based vulnerability and exposure management solution that unifies security findings, asset intelligence, and business context to prioritize remediation efforts based on actual organizational risk, enabling security teams to focus on vulnerabilities that matter most.

products.name: Axonius for Healthcare
products.description: Specialized medical device security platform designed for healthcare organizations to discover, classify, and secure connected medical devices including IoMT equipment, clinical systems, and diagnostic tools while maintaining HIPAA compliance and patient safety standards.

products.name: Axonius Federal
products.description: Government-focused cyber asset management solution meeting federal security requirements including FedRAMP authorization, providing continuous monitoring and risk scoring capabilities for Department of Defense and civilian agencies to maintain compliance and security posture.

AYAR-LABS.name: Ayar Labs
AYAR-LABS.tagline: Pioneering silicon photonics optical interconnects to eliminate data bottlenecks in AI infrastructure
AYAR-LABS.overview: Developer of optical interconnect solutions that use light instead of electricity to transmit data between chips, solving critical bandwidth bottlenecks in AI data center infrastructure and high-performance computing systems. The company focuses on silicon photonics technology that integrates optical components directly into semiconductor chips to achieve dramatically higher bandwidth and lower power consumption than traditional copper interconnects. It helps chip manufacturers, hyperscale cloud providers, and AI infrastructure companies to overcome data movement limitations in next-generation computing architectures. The company provides optical I/O chiplets, external light sources, and UCIe-compliant optical solutions. It promotes the transition from electrical to optical connectivity in semiconductor packaging.

products.name: TeraPHY Optical I/O Chiplet
products.description: Silicon photonics optical I/O chiplet that integrates directly with host ASICs and FPGAs to provide terabit-per-second bandwidth using wavelength division multiplexing, enabling AI accelerators and high-performance computing systems to overcome the bandwidth limitations of traditional electrical interconnects.

products.name: SuperNova Light Source
products.description: Multi-wavelength external laser source that powers TeraPHY optical chiplets by providing multiple wavelength channels simultaneously, enabling high-density optical communication without requiring on-chip laser integration and ensuring consistent optical performance across data center deployments.

products.name: UCIe Optical Chiplet
products.description: Universal Chiplet Interconnect Express compliant optical solution that enables multi-vendor interoperability for chiplet-based system designs, allowing different semiconductor manufacturers to integrate optical connectivity into their products using industry-standard packaging and protocols.

products.name: Optical I/O IP
products.description: Silicon photonics intellectual property portfolio enabling semiconductor companies to integrate optical interconnect capabilities into their own chip designs, including optical transceiver circuits, serializer-deserializer blocks, and signal processing components for high-bandwidth applications.

highlights.text: Mar 2025—Ayar Labs unveils world's first UCIe optical chiplet for AI scale-up architectures
Dec 2024—Ayar Labs raises $155M in Series D with AMD, Intel, NVIDIA backing
